lesson_html:
• Greetings: Start with a friendly "Hello!" or "Hi!" to make a good first impression.
  • Ask Questions: Follow your greeting with questions like "How are you?" to show interest.
  • Introduce Yourself: Say your name clearly, for example, "My name is John."
  • Respond: When someone introduces themselves, reply with "Nice to meet you, [Name]!"
  • Body Language: Smile and make eye contact to create a welcoming atmosphere.
